key_risks: Market competition from large national insurers and niche players
Exposure to catastrophic events such as hurricanes and wildfires
Economic sensitivity to downturns and interest rate fluctuations
controversies: Legal disputes involving policy waiting periods and excess liability coverage
Customer complaints filed with the BBB
environmental_issues: Vulnerability to losses from natural disasters
social_issues: Customer service quality and satisfaction issues
governance_issues: Compliance risks related to insider trading regulations
